author: ryanleeschneider
content:
BTW RE: 

> Question RE: 2) I'm curious how the clients that don't include the state root in pre-byzantium receipts actually handle serving devp2p GetReceipts requests for those.

I just synced a `reth` node locally to an early block (284957) and hacked up their `manual-p2p` example to send it a `GetReceipts` query for that block, and it looks like it's probably responding w/o the `root`, I'll confirm further before opening an issue upstream, I think at a minimum it should probably not respond for pre-byzantium receipts vs. sending back invalid responses, since IIUC this could lead to clients getting wrong receipt roots when syncing from it.  I know this is a bit off-topic now but figured it was a rabbit hole worth pursuing üôÇ
